name: MemoryOverload
short_description:
This is a simple plugin that, when installed, logs the current memory status of Bukkit to the console and the log file. Useful if you want to record the server status or is testing a plugin for memory leaks.

Recorded data are: TotalRAM MaxRAM FreeRAM UsedRAM

Record frequency: The Asynchronous Scheduler Starts 3 seconds after the plugin is enabled. This plugin logs Memory Data every minute (1200 Ticks) to both the console and the Bukkit log file.

Commands: Currently no commands are avaliable for this plugin.

Installation: Place the .jar file in to /plugins and you are good to go!

Configuration files: No configuration file is needed for this plugin.
summary: This is a Memory Monitoring plugin for Bukkit Minecraft Server
